question: Who are the individuals who have held the title 'Minister for Magic'?
What is the blood status of Cornelius Fudge and Pius Thicknesse?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?individual ?blood WHERE { ?individual a hp:Individual_ ; hp:blood ?blood . FILTER (?individual IN (hp:Cornelius_fudge, hp:Pius_thicknesse)) }

question: Who are the members of the Edgecombe family?
Who are the enemies of the International Confederation of Wizards?
What is the location of London and who are its residents?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?location ?resident WHERE { hp:London hp:location ?location . OPTIONAL {?location hp:residents ?resident .}}

question: Which individuals have a boggart that transforms into Tom Riddle?
Which organisations are affiliated with the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry?
What is the boggart of Cornelius Fudge?
Who is the Minister for Magic during Hector Fawley's term?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?minister WHERE { hp:Hector_fawley hp:title 'Minister_for_magic' . hp:Ministry_of_magic hp:leader ?minister .}

question: Who are the members of the Edgecombe family?
What is the blood status of Pius Thicknesse?
Where is the location of Whitehall?
Who are the enemies of the International Confederation of Wizards?
Who is the wife of Marietta Edgecombe's father?
Which individuals have loyalty to both the British Ministry of Magic and Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry?
Who are the residents of London?
What is the job of Millicent Bagnold?
Who are the male individuals that have served as Minister for Magic?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?individualName WHERE { ?individual hp:gender hp:Male ; hp:job hp:Minister_for_magic ; hp:name ?individualName .}

question: What is the location of the Edgecombe family?
Who are the members of the Edgecombe family?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?memberName WHERE { hp:Edgecombe_family hp:members ?member ; hp:name hp:Edgecombe_family . ?member hp:name ?memberName .}

question: Which organisations does Cornelius Fudge have loyalty to?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?organisationName WHERE { hp:Cornelius_fudge hp:loyalty ?organisation ; hp:name hp:Cornelius_fudge . ?organisation hp:name ?organisationName .}

question: Who are the enemies of the International Confederation of Wizards?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?enemyName WHERE { hp:International_confederation_of_wizards hp:enemies ?enemy ; hp:name hp:International_confederation_of_wizards . ?enemy hp:name ?enemyName .}

question: What is the blood status of Pius Thicknesse?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?bloodStatus WHERE { hp:Pius_thicknesse hp:blood ?blood ; hp:name hp:Pius_thicknesse . ?blood rdfs:label ?bloodStatus .}

question: What is the gender of Hector Fawley?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?gender WHERE { hp:Hector_fawley hp:gender ?gender ; hp:name hp:Hector_fawley .}

question: Which individuals have the loyalty of the Edgecombe family?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?individualName WHERE { hp:Edgecombe_family hp:loyalty ?loyalty ; hp:name hp:Edgecombe_family . ?individual hp:loyalty ?loyalty ; hp:name ?individualName .}

question: What is the species of Gellert Grindelwald?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?species WHERE { hp:Gellert_grindelwald hp:species ?species ; hp:name hp:Gellert_grindelwald .}

question: What is the affiliation of Millicent Bagnold?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?affiliationName WHERE { hp:Millicent_bagnold hp:affiliation ?affiliation ; hp:name hp:Millicent_bagnold . ?affiliation hp:name ?affiliationName .}

question: What is the affiliation of the International Confederation of Wizards?
Who is the leader of the Ministry of Magic?
What is the gender of Hector Fawley?
What is the location of Whitehall?
What is the species of Gellert Grindelwald?
What is the job of Hermione Granger?
Who are the enemies of the International Confederation of Wizards?
What is the status of the Edgecombe family?
Who are the members of the Edgecombe family?
What are the names of all individuals who have served as Minister for Magic and belong to a wizarding family of unknown degree?
SPQRQL: SELECT DISTINCT ?ministerName WHERE { ?minister hp:title hp:Minister_for_magic ; hp:job hp:Minister_for_magic ; hp:blood hp:Wizarding_family_of_unknown_degree . }

question: Who are the members of the Edgecombe family who attended Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and were sorted into Ravenclaw?
SPQRQL: SELECT DISTINCT ?memberName WHERE { hp:Edgecombe_family hp:members ?member . ?member hp:house hp:Ravenclaw ; hp:name ?memberName . }

question: Who are the individuals who have a patronus that is non-corporeal and have served as Minister for Magic?
SPQRQL: SELECT DISTINCT ?ministerName WHERE { ?minister hp:title hp:Minister_for_magic ; hp:patronus hp:Non_corporeal ; hp:species hp:Human .}

question: What are the names of all individuals who are not human and have served as Minister for Magic?
SPQRQL: SELECT DISTINCT ?ministerName WHERE { ?minister hp:title hp:Minister_for_magic ; hp:species ?species . FILTER (?species != hp:Human) ?minister hp:name ?ministerName . }

question: What are the names of all individuals who are affiliated with the British Ministry of Magic, are enemies of Gellert Grindelwald, and have served as Minister for Magic?
SPQRQL: SELECT DISTINCT ?ministerName WHERE { ?minister hp:affiliation hp:British_ministry_of_magic ; hp:name ?ministerName . ?icw hp:enemies hp:Gellert_grindelwald . FILTER NOT EXISTS { ?minister hp:loyalty ?loyalty . FILTER (?loyalty != hp:British_ministry_of_magic)} FILTER NOT EXISTS { ?minister hp:enemies hp:Gellert_grindelwald . }}

question: What is the blood status and boggart of Cornelius Fudge?
Who are the known members of the Edgecombe family?
Which organisations is Marietta Edgecombe loyal to?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?loyalty WHERE { hp:Edgecombe_family hp:loyalty ?loyalty . OPTIONAL { ?member hp:loyalty ?loyalty . FILTER(?member IN (hp:Marietta_edgecombe, hp:Marietta_edgecombes_father, hp:Marietta_edgecombes_mother))}}

question: What is the gender and blood status of Pius Thicknesse?
Who are the enemies of the International Confederation of Wizards?
What is the location of Whitehall?
Who are the residents of London?
What is the job title of Hermione Granger and which organisations is she loyal to?
Who is Cornelius Fudge?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?individual WHERE { hp:Cornelius_fudge rdf:type hp:Individual_ . ?individual rdf:type hp:Individual_ . FILTER(?individual = hp:Cornelius_fudge)}

question: What is the nationality of Cornelius Fudge?
Who are the ministers for magic that have the same title as Hector Fawley?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?minister WHERE { hp:Hector_fawley hp:title ?title . ?minister hp:title ?title . FILTER(?minister != hp:Hector_fawley) }

question: What is the boggart of Cornelius Fudge?
Who are the members of the Edgecombe family?
Who is the leader of the Ministry of Magic?
Who are the enemies of the International Confederation of Wizards?
Who has Tom Riddle as a boggart?
What is the affiliation of the Ministry of Magic and who is its leader?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?affiliation ?leader WHERE { hp:Ministry_of_magic hp:affiliation ?affiliation . hp:Ministry_of_magic hp:leader ?leader .}

question: Who are the members of the Edgecombe family and what is their house?
Who was the Minister for Magic before Cornelius Fudge?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?minister WHERE { ?minister hp:title hp:Minister_for_magic ; hp:job hp:Minister_for_magic ; hp:loyalty hp:British_ministry_of_magic ; hp:species hp:Human . FILTER (?minister != hp:Cornelius_fudge)}

question: Which individuals have served as Minister for Magic and are associated with Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?minister WHERE { ?minister hp:title hp:Minister_for_magic ; hp:job hp:Minister_for_magic ; hp:loyalty hp:British_ministry_of_magic, hp:Hogwarts_school_of_witchcraft_and_wizardry ; hp:species hp:Human .}

question: Who is/was a member of the Edgecombe family?
What is the location of the Whitehall building?
Which organizations are enemies of the International Confederation of Wizards?
What is the name of the organization associated with Hermione Granger?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?organization WHERE { hp:Hermione_granger hp:loyalty ?organization . FILTER (?organization != hp:British_ministry_of_magic)}

question: What is Cornelius Fudge's gender?
Who are the members of the Edgecombe family?
What is the status of the Edgecombe family?
What are the names and blood statuses of all the individuals who have been Ministers for Magic?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name ?blood_status WHERE { ?minister a hp:Individual_ ; hp:title hp:Minister_for_magic ; hp:name ?name ; hp:blood ?blood_status . }

question: Which organisations have affiliations with both the British Ministry of Magic and Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?org_name WHERE { ?org a hp:Organisation_ ; hp:affiliation hp:British_ministry_of_magic ; hp:affiliation hp:Hogwarts_school_of_witchcraft_and_wizardry ; hp:name ?org_name .}

question: Which individuals have the same blood status as Pius Thicknesse and are affiliated with either the British Ministry of Magic or the Death Eaters?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name WHERE { ?individual a hp:Individual_ ; hp:blood ?blood_status ; hp:loyalty hp:British_ministry_of_magic, hp:Death_eaters ; hp:name ?name . { SELECT ?blood_status WHERE { hp:Pius_thicknesse hp:blood ?blood_status .}}}

question: What are the blood statuses of individuals who have been Minister for Magic?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name ?blood WHERE { ?person hp:title hp:Minister_for_magic ; hp:name ?name ; hp:blood ?blood . }

question: What is the blood status and house of Marietta Edgecombe?
Who are the individuals who have loyalty to both the British Ministry of Magic and Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry?
Who are the individuals who have loyalty to the British Ministry of Magic and are also associated with the Death Eaters?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name WHERE { ?person hp:loyalty hp:British_ministry_of_magic, hp:Death_eaters ; hp:name ?name .}

question: What is the gender and location of Gellert Grindelwald?
Who were the individuals who were loyal to both the British Ministry of Magic and Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry?
Who were the enemies of the International Confederation of Wizards?
Who were the individuals who had the job of Minister for Magic and were Half-blood or Pure-blood?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?individualName WHERE { ?individual hp:job hp:Minister_for_magic . ?individual hp:blood hp:Half_blood, hp:Pure_blood . ?individual hp:name ?individualName . }

question: Who were the individuals who had a Non-corporeal patronus?
Who were the individuals who were born in Great Britain and had the job of Minister for Magic?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?individualName WHERE { ?individual hp:born hp:Great_britain . ?individual hp:job hp:Minister_for_magic . ?individual hp:name ?individualName . }

question: Who were the individuals who had Tom Riddle as their boggart?
What are the names of all individuals who have served as Minister for Magic?
Which individual's boggart is Tom Riddle?
Who are the individuals that belong to the Edgecombe family?
What are the names of all the enemies of the International Confederation of Wizards?
Who are the individuals that have served as Minister for Magic and are affiliated with Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name WHERE { ?minister hp:title hp:Minister_for_magic . ?minister hp:name ?name . ?minister hp:loyalty hp:Hogwarts_school_of_witchcraft_and_wizardry .}

question: What are the genders of individuals who are affiliated with the British Ministry of Magic?
SPQRQL: SELECT DISTINCT ?gender WHERE { ?individual hp:loyalty hp:British_ministry_of_magic . ?individual hp:gender ?gender . }

question: Who are the individuals that have served as Minister for Magic and have a non-corporeal patronus?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name WHERE { ?minister hp:title hp:Minister_for_magic . ?minister hp:patronus hp:Non_corporeal . ?minister hp:name ?name . }

question: What is the nationality of Hector Fawley?
Who are the individuals that have the job title of Minister for Magic and have served as a leader of the Ministry of Magic?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name WHERE { ?minister hp:title hp:Minister_for_magic . ?minister hp:job hp:Minister_for_magic . ?minister hp:leader ?minister . ?minister hp:name ?name .}

question: Who are the members of the Edgecombe family and what is their status?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name ?member ?status WHERE { hp:Edgecombe_family hp:name ?name ; hp:members ?member ; hp:status ?status .}

question: What is the job of Cornelius Fudge and what is his boggart?
What is the location of Whitehall and who are its affiliations?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name ?location ?affiliation WHERE { hp:Whitehall hp:name ?name ; hp:location ?location ; hp:affiliation ?affiliation .}

question: Who is the wife of Marietta Edgecombe's father?
Which organizations have the enemies 'Death Eaters', 'Order of the Phoenix', and 'Tom Riddle'?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?orgName WHERE { ?org a hp:Organisation_ ; hp:name ?orgName ; hp:enemies hp:Death_eaters, hp:Order_of_the_phoenix, hp:Tom_riddle .}

question: What are the headquarters of the organizations with the intention of 'reverting the consequences of major magical mishaps'?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?orgName ?headquarters WHERE { ?org a hp:Organisation_ ; hp:name ?orgName ; hp:intentions hp:Reverting_the_consequences_of_major_magical_mishaps ; hp:headquarters ?headquarters .}

question: Who were the male advisors to the Minister for Magic?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?advisor WHERE { ?advisor hp:gender hp:Male . ?advisor hp:job hp:Advisor_to_the_minister_for_magic .}

question: What are the affiliations and intentions of the Department of Magical Accidents and Catastrophes?
Who are the individuals with the loyalty to the British Ministry of Magic, the Order of the Phoenix, and Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?individual WHERE { ?individual hp:loyalty hp:British_ministry_of_magic . ?individual hp:loyalty hp:Order_of_the_phoenix . ?individual hp:loyalty hp:Hogwarts_school_of_witchcraft_and_wizardry .}

question: Which organisations have enemies in common with the Department of Magical Accidents and Catastrophes?
SPQRQL: SELECT DISTINCT ?org1 ?org2 WHERE { hp:Department_of_magical_accidents_and_catastrophes hp:enemies ?enemy . ?org1 hp:enemies ?enemy . ?org2 hp:enemies ?enemy . FILTER(?org1 != ?org2) }

question: Who are the individuals with the title of Chief Warlock and their gender?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name ?gender WHERE { ?individual hp:job hp:Chief_warlock ; hp:title hp:Chief_warlock . ?individual hp:name ?name . ?individual hp:gender ?gender .}

question: What are the locations of the Minister for Magic's office and the British Ministry of Magic headquarters?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?office_location ?headquarters_location WHERE { hp:Minister_for_magics_office hp:location ?office_location . hp:British_ministry_of_magic_headquarters hp:location ?headquarters_location .}

question: Who are the individuals with the job of Stylish Wizard of the Year?
Who are the half-bloods?
What are the names of the organisations with the colour codes #9966cc and #C9a0dc?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name WHERE { ?org hp:bgcolor hp:9966cc, hp:C9a0dc . ?org hp:name ?name . }

question: Who are the individuals with Hermione Granger's job and title?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?individual WHERE { ?individual hp:job hp:Department_of_magical_law_enforcement, hp:Minister_for_magic . ?individual hp:title hp:Department_of_magical_law_enforcement, hp:Minister_for_magic . }

question: What is the affiliation of the Educational Office organization?
Who won the Stylish Wizard of the Year award?
What is the source URL for the Pure-blood page?
What is the name of the organization that deals with magical accidents and catastrophes?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name WHERE {?org a hp:Organisation_ ; hp:name ?name ; hp:intentions hp:Reverting_the_consequences_of_major_magical_mishaps .}

question: Who is the Chief Warlock of the Wizengamot in 1544?
What is the affiliation of the Improper Use of Magic Office organization?
What is the name of the wand that belongs to Cornelius Fudge?
What is the name of the organization that oversees the wizarding schools?
Who is the wife of Cornelius Fudge?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name WHERE { hp:Cornelius_fudges_wife hp:husband hp:Cornelius_fudge ; hp:name ?name .}

question: What is the name of the organization that the Minister for Magic's office is affiliated with?
What are the names and affiliations of the individuals who are affiliated with both the British Ministry of Magic and the Order of the Phoenix?
SPQRQL: SELECT DISTINCT ?name ?affiliation WHERE { ?individual hp:affiliation hp:British_ministry_of_magic, hp:Order_of_the_phoenix ; hp:name ?name ; hp:species hp:Human ; hp:affiliation ?affiliation .}

question: Who are the leaders of the International Confederation of Wizards and the Educational Office in the Harry Potter universe?
SPQRQL: SELECT DISTINCT ?leader1 ?leader2 WHERE { hp:International_confederation_of_wizards hp:leader ?leader1 . hp:Educational_office hp:leader ?leader2 .}

question: What are the headquarters, enemies, and intentions of the Improper Use of Magic Office and the Department of Magical Accidents and Catastrophes in the Harry Potter universe?
SPQRQL: SELECT DISTINCT ?name ?headquarters ?enemies ?intentions WHERE { hp:Improper_use_of_magic_office hp:name ?name ; hp:headquarters ?headquarters ; hp:enemies ?enemies . hp:Department_of_magical_accidents_and_catastrophes hp:name ?name ; hp:headquarters ?headquarters ; hp:enemies ?enemies ; hp:intentions ?intentions . }

question: Who are the male individuals affiliated with Ravenclaw House in the Harry Potter universe?
SPQRQL: SELECT DISTINCT ?name WHERE { ?individual hp:affiliation hp:Ravenclaw ; hp:gender hp:Male ; hp:name ?name ; hp:species hp:Human .}

question: What is the name of the organization led by the International Confederation of Wizards and affiliated with Wizardkind?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?organizationName WHERE { hp:Educational_office hp:name ?organizationName ; hp:leader hp:International_confederation_of_wizards ; hp:affiliation hp:Wizardkind .}

question: Which organization is dedicated to reverting the consequences of major magical mishaps and headquartered in the British Ministry of Magic?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?organizationName WHERE { hp:Department_of_magical_accidents_and_catastrophes hp:name ?organizationName ; hp:headquarters hp:British_ministry_of_magic ; hp:intentions hp:Reverting_the_consequences_of_major_magical_mishaps .}

question: Who is the current Minister for Magic and what is the name of their office?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?ministerName ?officeName WHERE { hp:Minister_for_magics_office hp:name ?officeName . ?minister hp:job hp:Minister_for_magic ; hp:name ?ministerName .}

question: Which organization is responsible for reversing the consequences of major magical mishaps?
What is the name and gender of the wizard who won the Stylish Wizard of the Year award?
What is the blood status of Queenie Goldstein?
Who is the Chief Warlock of the Wizengamot and what was his title in 1544?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?currentChiefWarlock ?title1544 WHERE { ?currentChiefWarlock hp:job hp:Chief_warlock, hp:Wizengamot ; hp:name ?name ; hp:title ?title1544 . FILTER(CONTAINS(?title1544, "1544"))}

question: Who was the Chief Warlock of the Wizengamot in 1544?
Who owned Cornelius Fudge's wand?
Which organization does Hermione Granger work for?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?organization_name WHERE { hp:Hermione_granger hp:job ?job_title . ?job_title hp:name ?organization_name . FILTER(CONTAINS(?organization_name, "Office"))}

question: Who is the wife of Cornelius Fudge?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?wife_name WHERE { hp:Cornelius_fudges_wife hp:husband hp:Cornelius_fudge . hp:Cornelius_fudges_wife hp:name ?wife_name .}

question: Which Hogwarts house does Hermione Granger belong to?
Which organizations are enemies of the Improper Use of Magic Office?
What is the intention of the Department of Magical Accidents and Catastrophes?
What is the loyalty of Peeves?
What are the names and genders of individuals associated with the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, and what are their loyalties?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name ?gender ?loyalty WHERE { ?individual hp:gender ?gender ; hp:loyalty ?loyalty ; hp:theme hp:Mom ; hp:species hp:Human ; hp:name ?name . FILTER regex(?loyalty, "Hogwarts_school_of_witchcraft_and_wizardry")}

question: What is the name of the office of the head of the British Ministry of Magic and where is it located?
Which organizations are affiliated with the International Confederation of Wizards?
What is the job of Hermione Granger and what are her loyalties?
Who are the members of the Fudge family and what are their relationships to Cornelius Fudge?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name ?relationship WHERE { ?individual hp:name ?name ; hp:family ?fudge_member ; hp:husband hp:Cornelius_fudge ; hp:loyalty ?loyalty ; hp:species hp:Human . FILTER regex(?fudge_member, "Fudge_family") BIND(IF(?name = "Cornelius Fudge's Wife", "Wife", "Nephew") AS ?relationship)}

question: Who are the individuals associated with the British Ministry of Magic's Department of Magical Law Enforcement?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?individual WHERE { ?individual hp:affiliation hp:British_ministry_of_magic . ?individual hp:job hp:Department_of_magical_law_enforcement .}

question: What is the wand made by Cornelius Fudge in 1993?
Who are the individuals associated with the Hufflepuff house?
Who is the Chief Warlock of the Wizengamot and what was their job?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name ?job WHERE { ?person hp:name ?name ; hp:job ?job ; hp:Chief_warlock true .}

question: What organization is Cornelius Fudge's wand affiliated with?
Who is the head of the Educational Office and what organization are they affiliated with?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name ?org WHERE { ?person hp:name ?name ; hp:leader ?org ; hp:Educational_office true .}

question: What Hogwarts house does Hermione Granger belong to and what is her current job title?
Who is Cornelius Fudge's wife and what is her relationship to Rufus Fudge?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name ?relationship WHERE { ?person hp:husband hp:Cornelius_fudge ; hp:nephew hp:Rufus_fudge ; hp:name ?name ; hp:species hp:Human .}

question: Who are the individuals affiliated with the Department of Magical Accidents and Catastrophes who have a job title?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?individual ?title WHERE { ?individual hp:affiliation hp:Department_of_magical_accidents_and_catastrophes ; hp:title ?title . FILTER isIRI(?individual) && isIRI(?title) }

question: Which organization has the most enemies?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?org (COUNT(?enemy) AS ?enemyCount) WHERE { ?org hp:enemies ?enemy . } GROUP BY ?org ORDER BY DESC(?enemyCount) LIMIT 1

question: Who are the wizards who have won the Stylish Wizard of the Year award and what is their gender?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?wizard ?gender WHERE { hp:Stylish_wizard_of_the_year hp:winner ?wizard . OPTIONAL { ?wizard hp:gender ?gender . }}

question: Which Hogwarts house has the most individuals affiliated with it and what are their names?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?house (GROUP_CONCAT(?name; separator=", ") AS ?names) WHERE { ?individual hp:house ?house ; hp:name ?name . } GROUP BY ?house ORDER BY DESC(COUNT(?individual)) LIMIT 1

question: Who are the individuals affiliated with the British Ministry of Magic who are also members of the Order of the Phoenix?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?individual WHERE { ?individual hp:affiliation hp:British_ministry_of_magic . ?individual hp:loyalty hp:Order_of_the_phoenix . }

question: Which organizations have the intention of reverting the consequences of major magical mishaps and are enemies of both the Death Eaters and the Order of the Phoenix?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?organization WHERE { ?organization hp:intentions hp:Reverting_the_consequences_of_major_magical_mishaps . ?organization hp:enemies hp:Death_eaters, hp:Order_of_the_phoenix .}

question: Who are the individuals who have held the job of Minister for Magic and were also members of Gryffindor house at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?individual WHERE { ?individual hp:job hp:Minister_for_magic . ?individual hp:house hp:Gryffindor . }

question: Which individuals have been affiliated with the British Ministry of Magic, have held a job in the Department of Magical Law Enforcement, and are also members of the Order of the Phoenix?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?individual WHERE { ?individual hp:affiliation hp:British_ministry_of_magic . ?individual hp:job hp:Department_of_magical_law_enforcement . ?individual hp:loyalty hp:Order_of_the_phoenix . }

question: What are the names of the individuals who are affiliated with the British Ministry of Magic and have a job that includes the title "chief warlock"?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name WHERE { ?individual hp:affiliation hp:British_ministry_of_magic . ?individual hp:job ?job . ?job hp:title ?title . FILTER regex(?title, "chief warlock", "i") . ?individual hp:name ?name . }

question: What are the affiliations of Queenie Goldstein and what is her species?
Who is the chief warlock of the Wizengamot and what is their gender?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name ?gender WHERE { ?chief_warlock hp:name ?name ; hp:gender ?gender ; hp:job hp:Chief_warlock, hp:Wizengamot .}

Who are the advisors to the Minister for Magic?
What are the names of all the organisations affiliated with the British Ministry of Magic?
Who are the individuals who have loyalty to the Order of the Phoenix?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?individual WHERE { ?individual hp:loyalty hp:Order_of_the_phoenix ; a hp:Individual_ .}

question: Who are the individuals affiliated with the British Ministry of Magic who have held the job of Minister for Magic?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?individual WHERE { ?individual hp:affiliation hp:British_ministry_of_magic ; hp:job hp:Minister_for_magic .}

question: What are the names of the individuals affiliated with the British Ministry of Magic who have been appointed Chief Warlock of the Wizengamot?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name WHERE { ?individual hp:affiliation hp:British_ministry_of_magic ; hp:job hp:Chief_warlock, hp:Wizengamot ; hp:name ?name . }

What individuals are affiliated with Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and have been awarded the Order of Merlin?
Who are the individuals affiliated with the British Ministry of Magic who have held the job of Minister for Magic and have also been members of the Order of the Phoenix?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?individual WHERE { ?individual hp:affiliation hp:British_ministry_of_magic ; hp:job hp:Minister_for_magic ; hp:loyalty hp:Order_of_the_phoenix . }

Who are the enemies of the Department of Magical Accidents and Catastrophes?

What were the names of the wizards who held the position of Chief Warlock of the Wizengamot before and after Chief Warlock of the Wizengamot in 1544?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?previousChiefWarlock ?successorChiefWarlock WHERE { hp:Chief_warlock_of_the_wizengamot_in_1544 hp:predecessor ?previousChiefWarlock . hp:Chief_warlock_of_the_wizengamot_in_1544 hp:successor ?successorChiefWarlock . ?previousChiefWarlock hp:job hp:Chief_warlock, hp:Wizengamot . ?successorChiefWarlock hp:job hp:Chief_warlock, hp:Wizengamot . FILTER(?previousChiefWarlock != hp:Chief_warlock_of_the_wizengamot_in_1544 && ?successorChiefWarlock != hp:Chief_warlock_of_the_wizengamot_in_1544) }

question: Which Hogwarts houses did Hermione Granger and Queenie Goldstein belong to?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?hermioneHouse ?queenieHouse WHERE { hp:Hermione_granger hp:house ?hermioneHouse . hp:Queenie_goldstein hp:house ?queenieHouse . }

question: What was the blood status of Cornelius Fudge's wife?
Which organizations did Hermione Granger belong to, and what positions did she hold in those organizations?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?organization ?position WHERE { hp:Hermione_granger hp:job ?position . ?organization hp:leader hp:Hermione_granger . FILTER(?organization != hp:Hermione_granger) }

question: Who was the leader of the International Confederation of Wizards' Educational Office?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?leader WHERE { hp:Educational_office hp:leader ?leader . ?leader hp:job hp:Leader . }

question: Which organizations had enemies in common, and what were those enemies?
SPQRQL: SELECT DISTINCT ?org1 ?org2 ?enemy WHERE { ?org1 hp:enemies ?enemy . ?org2 hp:enemies ?enemy . FILTER(?org1 != ?org2) }

question: What were the names of all the Hogwarts houses, and who were their respective founders?
Which organizations had headquarters located at the British Ministry of Magic?
What are the names of the individuals who are both members of the Order of the Phoenix and loyal to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name WHERE { ?person hp:loyalty hp:Hogwarts_school_of_witchcraft_and_wizardry, hp:Order_of_the_phoenix ; hp:name ?name . ?person a hp:Individual_ . }

question: What is the name of the individual who was Chief Warlock of the Wizengamot in 1544 and what is their gender?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name ?gender WHERE { hp:Chief_warlock_of_the_wizengamot_in_1544 hp:name ?name ; hp:gender ?gender . hp:Chief_warlock_of_the_wizengamot_in_1544 a hp:Individual_ . }

question: What is the name of the wand that belonged to Cornelius Fudge and who were its masters?
What are the names of the individuals who have the loyalty to the British Ministry of Magic and the Gryffindor house?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?name WHERE { ?person hp:loyalty hp:British_ministry_of_magic, hp:Gryffindor ; hp:name ?name . ?person a hp:Individual_ . }

question: Who is the head of Hogwarts Castle?
SPQRQL: SELECT ?headmasterName WHERE { hp:Hogwarts_castle hp:owner hp:Hogwarts_school_of_witchcraft_and_wizardry . hp:Hogwarts_castle hp:location hp:Scotland . hp:Headmaster hp:seat hp:Hogwarts_castle . hp:Headmaster hp:name ?headmasterName . }

question: What is the affiliation of the Astronomy Tower?

question: What is the name of the organization founded by Harry Potter in 1997?
